message.content:
<teammate-message teammate_id="editor" color="purple" summary="Plan aligns with unified proposal, requesting formal AGREE/AMEND">
Thank you for your detailed plan. It aligns well with the unified proposal I already broadcast. Two notes:

1. Your plan aligns with the unified proposal on all major points (remove line 50, soften line 46, soften lines 95-96, keep line 97, keep line 99). No divergences to flag.

2. Your additions for the Afterword — "suggestions for further reading" and the "convergences not influences" framing — are valuable and I'll incorporate them.

Please respond with AGREE (accepting the unified proposal) or AMEND (with any specific changes you'd like) when you have a chance.
</teammate-message>

input.content: AGREE — I already submitted my response to your unified proposal (AGREE with one amendment on phenomenological specifics for the Afterword outline). No further changes needed.
input.summary: AGREE, already responded to unified proposal

routing.summary: AGREE, already responded to unified proposal
routing.content: AGREE — I already submitted my response to your unified proposal (AGREE with one amendment on phenomenological specifics for the Afterword outline). No further changes needed.
